CHSH and physical boundaries for 2-spin subsytems in XXZ ground states

Measurement rule: Spherical harmonics up to degree D=5
N_hidden = 2^15
N_measures = 2^9
N_measures_test = 2^14
N_steps = 2e6 + N_steps_ft
N_steps_ft = 1e3
learning_rate = 2e-5 * N_hidden
